srm_base_coverage

Base class for coverage model.

User coverage model must derive from this base class and install it at any level of the design hierarchy.

Summary
srm_base_coverage
Base class for coverage model.
Class Declaration
class srm_base_coverage
Initialization
newCreate a new instance with the name.
get_nameGet the name of the object.
post_writeThis will get called at the end of write task for the attached nodes.
post_readThis will get called at the end of read task for the attached nodes.
sample_xactFIXME: only see it in write but not in read.

Get the name of the object.

post_write

virtual function void post_write( srm_base_reg  entry )

This will get called at the end of write task for the attached nodes.

post_read

virtual function void post_read( srm_base_reg  entry )

This will get called at the end of read task for the attached nodes.
